text: Love Without Distance () is a 2015 Chinese romantic comedy film directed by Aubrey Lam. It was released in China on May 21, 2015. ==Cast== *Francis Ng *Yao Xingtong *Ma Tianyu *Li Jing *Cica Zhou ==Reception== Love Without Distance opened in China on May 22, 2015 earning $3.55 million in its opening weekend, which was the highest-opening for a Chinese film that weekend and falling in third place at the Chinese box office behind Hollywood film Avengers: Age of Ultron and Bollywood film PK. ==References== Category:2015 romantic comedy films Category:Chinese films Category:Chinese romantic comedy films Category:2015 comedy films
title: Love Without Distance
